item.title: Best at Clash Royale
item.description: Intro I have been playing this game for about two years, and I really LOVE this game! In this blog, I’ll talk about few things that I feel is important to be a good player. Those are only from my experience and understanding of this game. Basics 1. Understanding the rules of the game First thing to know is understand the game. For example, what is the win condition? what is elixir?
